医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用共振声测压法连续无创血压监测共振声测压 (RSM)，使用超声成像进行无创、免校准连续血压 (BP) 测量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/连续-非侵入-血液-压力-监测-using-resonance-sonomanometry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/连续-非侵入-血液-压力-监测-using-resonance-sonomanometry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3236b174-e1d6-4069-97ac-c348a03aaa99 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 08:13:00 -0400 Continuous noninvasive blood pressure monitoring using resonance sonomanometry
开发新工具评估老年人跌倒风险老龄化社会带来了一个新的全球性问题：跌倒的风险。据估计，每年有三分之一的 65 岁以上成年人跌倒，并且由此造成的伤害变得越来越普遍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/New-tool-development-to-assess-fall-risks-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/New-tool-development-to-assess-fall-risks-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18ab3ee0-ec85-48a6-8258-247b0357839c Thu, 01 Aug 2024 07:49:00 -0400 New tool developed to assess fall risks in older adults

单细胞 RNA 测序揭示中风引起的脑损伤中风会对大脑造成不可逆转的损伤，是导致依赖性或死亡的最常见原因之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Single-cell-RNA-sequencing-sheds-light-on-中风-induced-brain-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Single-cell-RNA-sequencing-sheds-light-on-中风-induced-brain-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ab5c19d-5fe1-4f0e-a879-57552e6233d7 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 07:37:00 -0400 Single-cell RNA sequencing sheds light on stroke-induced brain damage
缩小差距：联合国儿童基金会和世界卫生组织呼吁改善母乳喂养支持过去12年里，全球6个月以下纯母乳喂养的婴儿数量增加了10%以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Closing-the-gap-UNICEF-and-WHO-call-for-improved-breastfeeding-support.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Closing-the-gap-UNICEF-and-WHO-call-for-improved-breastfeeding-support.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a83f90f8-7d4c-49a5-b8c0-4ca96e9b7bd3 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 07:29:57 -0400 Closing the gap: UNICEF and WHO call for improved breastfeeding support
印度投资8500万美元支持世界卫生组织全球传统医学中心在世界范围内，数十亿人为了健康和福祉而使用传统医学。在日内瓦举行的签字仪式上，印度政府承诺在 2022 年至 2032 年 10 年间提供 8500 万美元，用于支持世卫组织全球传统医学中心的规划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/India-invests-2485-million-to-boost-WHO-Global-Traditional-Medicine-Centre.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/India-invests-2485-million-to-boost-WHO-Global-Traditional-Medicine-Centre.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a3f5e46-78a6-4fe5-9645-911dcda9d2b4 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 07:18:02 -0400
共和党指控哈里斯支持纳税人资助的所有移民护理，但忽视了细节共和党人和前总统特朗普的盟友在移民问题上攻击副总统卡马拉·哈里斯，称这位民主党总统候选人支持使用纳税人的钱为未经合法许可在美国境内的移民提供免费医疗保险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/GOP-charge-that-Harris-backed-taxpayer-funded-care-for-all-immigrants-overlooks-details.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/GOP-charge-that-Harris-backed-taxpayer-funded-care-for-all-immigrants-overlooks-details.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ade48fb-fe05-4c12-aa8d-654ee4325e7a Thu, 01 Aug 2024 07:07:49 -0400 GOP charge that Harris backed taxpayer-funded care for all immigrants overlooks details
高炎症性类风湿性关节炎患者更容易出现认知障碍研究人员评估了持续炎症活动的类风湿关节炎患者的认知功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/高度炎症-类风湿关节炎-患者-more-susceptible-to-cognitive-impairment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Highly-炎症-类风湿关节炎-患者-more-susceptible-to-cognitive-impairment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96fb0532-30fb-42e9-bc0a-692fdbe25e61 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 03:41:00 -0400 Highly inflammatory rheumatoid arthritis patients more susceptible to cognitive impairment
高频偏心阻力训练可降低被动肌肉僵硬阻力训练或重量训练在运动和康复中被广泛推荐为增加肌肉力量和尺寸的有效运动。这种形式的锻炼涉及对肌肉收缩施加阻力以增强力量。然而，一些从业者认为，随着时间的推移，阻力训练会增加被动肌肉的僵硬。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/High-Frequency-eccentric-resistance-training-decreases-passive-muscle-stiffness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/高频-偏心-阻力-训练-减少-被动-肌肉-stiffness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f04d72a-b8b7-44e8-a48c-da5fd1a57772 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 02:59:44 -0400 High-frequency eccentric resistance training decreases passive muscle stiffness
新工具有助于识别有跌倒风险的老年人老龄化社会带来了一个新的全球性问题：跌倒的风险。据估计，每年有三分之一的 65 岁以上成年人跌倒，并且由此造成的伤害变得越来越普遍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/New-tool-helps-identify-older-adults-at-risk-of-falling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/New-tool-helps-identify-older-adults-at-risk-of-falling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=231d8ad1-6584-4829-91f3-ab556a910229 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 02:51:03 -0400 New tool helps identify older adults at risk of falling
